Text: vehicle rental in Gillette Cc you guys because of our past experience and situation I wanted to have you guys let me know what to do on insurance The Gillette office is going to lease a wheel drive vehicle for month The lease is through Enterprise and they are asking if we want them to add insurance Enron doesnt have a corporate rate for Enterprise I dont want to assume anything so should we have them add it or not I am checking into trying to lease from Avis because we do have a rental agreement with them Thanks Jessica Car Rental Contracts Rental car contracts for January through December have been awarded to National Car Rental and Avis Rent A Car System Inc When you rent a vehicle from National or Avis under the Contract the daily rental rate includes two kinds of insurance Avis the coverage is per person per occurrence and for property damage These coverages only apply when the vehicle is rented at the contract rate using the following state contract identifier numbers National Avis A

FW West Coast White Shark TripGerald and Bruce Thought I would just forward this message from my brother to you guys Gerald Ive heard you dive quite a bit and thought you might enjoy this My brother Matt is an avid diver and I trust he knows his stuff No big deal just thought I would share Thanks Jessica Wentworth FAX Forwarded by Jessica A WentworthNAEnron on AM Original Message From OBrien Matthew J mailto Sent Tuesday November AM To Dave Wentworth Email Greg Seemann Email Jay Salvo Email Richard C Steinfeldt Email Steve Jacobs JacosItisCom Email Salzmann William B Subject FW West Coast White Shark Trip Anyone up for a little shark trip I have dove with Paul Anes before on a blue shark dive trip It was great MattO Original Message From Paul Anes mailto Sent Monday November PM To PETER ENTLEYCOM Subject West Coast White Shark Trip I am pleased to announce that details have been finalized for an upcomming White Shark expediton scheduled for Sept aboard the ft Horizon liveaboard Cost is This is a limited load trip We will only be taking divers The Horizon will depart from San Diego bound for Guadelupe Island off the Baja Mexico coast Guadelupe Is is known as one of the premier big fish destinations for long range sportsfishermen The white sharks there have been scaring the hell out of the fishermen when they rise out of the deep to snatch the large tuna hooked by the fishermen as they bring them to the boat You can download trip details at guadalupehtm I hope you can join us on this very special expediton to dive with the Ultimate Predator Regards Doc AnesSan Diego Shark Diving
